reviewText: I grew up in a little town where we had a rodeo every summer which was just a 3 night event. I looked forward every summer for this event and I watch it on tv whenever I can. I have bought several dvd's of rodeo and I enjoy them all, in fact I can watch them over and over and never get enough of rodeo. This is a good dvd ta watch and it makes ya wish you were their.
My grandson loves it
I bought this as a gift and he loved it! I recommend this for anyone who bull rides or enjoys watching the sport it's a great movie to add to your collection.
Was bought as a gift. Recipient pleased.
Love watching it
Boyfriend loved it!
My son loves it!
Got this for a birthday present and he loves it
Very well done program for those really,really interested in bull-riding. Excellent photography and description of the life of bull riders

ENJOY WATCHING BULL RIDING.  THIS ONE HAD BACKGROUND INFO FROM ALL THE RIDERS AND CLOWNS.

IT WAS ENJOYABLE!  WILL BUY MORE.

These guys are really tough. It needs a lot of guts to mess with these giants of meat and muscles.
Up here where i live (old europe), bull riding is not very popular, because the people don't know anything about it.
But who cares. I like it and this dvd ist well produced and it's great to watch it.
bought this for my grandson and he LOVE'S IT!
Bought this for my dad, and he loved it! Made us watch the whole thing the same day it arrived.
Bought it for my son
This was a gift for my brother who use to ride bulls. he loves it
I am a huge fan of lane frost and this video was excellent! If you only know him from the movie then your in for a treat! Great documentary and so fun to watch!
Loved it!
This dvd was great

How can you go wrong with the toughest sport on dirt. A great look at all around the PBR how it got started, why it was started, where it is going to go. All kinds of information about the sport we call Professional Bull Riding
It was good
Waiting on my wife from work to watch toughest on earth together hardly can wait I know its going to be good thanks for getting it here fast
